title: Paradigm Chronicles Newsletter Issue 03
summary: The Paradigm Chronicles Issue - 03 newsletter from K-Hub Media Labs details work across three deep-tech verticals: Drugparadigm, which developed the Macro-Equi-Diff (MED) AI model for geometry-aware macrocycle drug design; Cyberparadigm, which launched new Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) challenges on its "Let Us Hack" learning platform; and Roboparadigm, which completed the software integration to upgrade the OpenMANIPULATOR-X robot to 6 Degrees of Freedom (DOF)

highlights.title: Macrocycles
highlights.description: Drugparadigm focuses on AI-driven design of complex drug modalities using Macro-Equi-Diff (MED)

highlights.title: XSS and CSRF
highlights.description: Cyberparadigm offers hands-on web security challenges like XSS and CSRF on its "Let Us Hack" platform

highlights.title: Upgrade OpenMANIPULATOR-X
highlights.description: Roboparadigm successfully integrated the software necessary to upgrade the OpenMANIPULATOR-X robot to 6 Degrees of Freedom (DOF) for robotic automation
